text:
Silvia Avegno (born 15 June 1997 in Genoa) is an Italian water polo player. She was a member of the Italian women's national water polo team. She played at the 2018 Women's European Water Polo Championship and 2019 World Aquatics Championships.
She played for Rapallo Pallanuoto.

annotations.surface_form: Italian women's national water polo team
